scripts.postbuild: npm run copy-static && npm run copy-js && npm run copy-media && npm run copy-main
scripts.copy-static: copyfiles -f build/static/css/**.* ../resources/static/static/css && echo CSS files copied
scripts.copy-js: copyfiles -f build/static/js/**.* ../resources/static/static/js && echo JS files copied
scripts.copy-media: copyfiles -f build/static/media/**.* ../resources/static/static/media && echo Media files copied
scripts.copy-main: copyfiles -f build/**.* ../resources/static/ && echo All files copied
